title: I Was a Non-Blonde Cheerleader
description: Annisa Gobrowski has a problem—everyone at her new high school in Florida is blonde. If Annisa’s Jersey attitude doesn’t make her stand out enough, her dark pixie haircut sure does. Yet no lack of golden highlights is going to stop Annisa from making the best of Sand Dune High, especially once she checks out the competition-level cheerleading squad.
author: Kieran Scott
